Blog.post: Well this was a great weekend. John Morris driving the Orange Vintage Vee Dub Drag car won a 1st place Wally Award down in Woodburn OR. I was there doing the PiT thing. On saturday we ran into some Carb Problems but were able to temporarly correct it with a ford Carb tool (AKA a HAMMER) to take a victory in the ET-1 Class on sunday. I'm going to take this time to Thank all of our sponsors. Vintage Vee Dub - Port Orchard WA urlLink Streetprowler.com - Seattle, WA urlLink Kyotousa.com - Seattle, WA urlLink Lillfox.com - Port Orchard, WA Strictly Speed - Poulsbo, WA - Best Damn VW Race and everyday Trasmissions avalible I want to also Thank John for letting me tag along. It was Very Fun (Cept for the Cold Night hehe) Jay Out!

One day and night of fun. After all the dial in's and unpredictablility of the track and tire with night driving we ended up going to damn fast. But it wasn't a total waste. Mark and Bob took the last race with Mark coming out on top for the win. Good job. Next time looks like we will be a Breamerton Raceway. See ya there! Jason Ps. Pictures to come soon.

We will be attending the VW DRAGS VOLKSFEST a Renegade Raceway. If you have a VW come to the event. Come see Johns Cool '57 Oval Drag Car. There will also be a bunch of other VW's there. Check out the Site for more details urlLink Renegade Raceway Jay Out!

urlLink Lets Goto NHRA's Site to see more pics It seems that everyone wants to be in the Winners Picture. Well I am in the back of John Morris (after all it was His day) John was also Listed in the local papers here in town. urlLink Here is the news clipping. Here is a repost of what was said LOCAL MOTORSPORTS Morris races VW to national victory Chris Horn August 29, 2003 Port Orchard's John Morris traveled to Woodburn, Ore., last weekend to compete in the National Hot Rod Association Summit Sport Compact Series, a national traveling series. Morris, 34, in just his second season of competition, entered his 1957 Volkswagen in the ET-1 class. It was his first NHRA event and he won it, topping a field of 76 cars with a best run of 11.44 seconds at 115 mph. The VW is mostly stock in appearance but has a 1900cc engine with one stage of nitrous oxide. Jay Out

Well last race of the season transmission took a Shiznitty. Oh well it had like 90 passes on it. Denis over at Strictly Speed is gonna build us a new fresh one for next time. Now its the off season for racing. See you in the spring.. Good thing too. I was getting behind at work.. now back to DiningDirectories.com Gotta get it up one of these days.. Latah! JAY
urlLink Off to Sacramento CA... See you there urlLink

Well its been a few months since my last post. Here is the scoop. I have been creating a website for urlLink www.volksfab.com go check it out and let me know what you think. John , Denis and others (let me know who you are) Came up with a northwest import drag racing association or NIDRA Upgrades to John's race bug Total new motor Bus trans There has been some misshaps since the race season started again. New trans took a chit. Should be ready for the next race though. Thats it for now.. Later JaY
